tiles.name: Abandoned Factory Sector
tiles.description: Dilapidated factory complex; concrete and metal dominating the terrain. Features graffiti and hidden entrances.

tiles.name: Derelict Housing Block
tiles.description: Rubble-strewn former housing. Makeshift shelters are visible. Security cameras are present but likely damaged.

tiles.name: Polluted Waterway Junction
tiles.description: Convergence of sewage-filled canals. Metal walkways provide treacherous passage. Neon signs flicker dimly.

tiles.name: Collapsed Tunnel Entrance
tiles.description: Partially collapsed entrance to the Underground Tunnels. Concrete and dirt dominate. Technological dead end nearby.

tiles.name: Central Plaza Ruins
tiles.description: Rubble-covered plaza. Faint holographic advertisements flicker. Potential Whisper Network activity.

tiles.name: Rooftop Access Point
tiles.description: Metal stairs leading to a rooftop. Offers vantage point overlooking the Ghost District.

tiles.name: Forgotten Workshop
tiles.description: Concrete and metal workshop with scattered tools and broken machinery. Strong scent of sewage.

tiles.name: Dilapidated Power Station
tiles.description: Technological Dead End: Decayed power station. Metal and concrete structures are falling apart.

tiles.name: Underground Entrance (Hidden)
tiles.description: A hidden entrance leading into the underground tunnels, concealed by graffiti and rubble.
